reviews.review: Melhor jogo da categoria, 4 contra 1, se no passado teve problemas tecnicos, hj não tem mais, recomendo muito pra jogar com os amigos, nem tanto pra jogar sozinho.

Momentos tensos, ficar olhando por cima do ombro procurando o caçador, o coração bate mais forte. Adoro, mas como quase todo jogo tem seus problemas e bugs, mas não penso que sejam coisas tão graves já que não afetam realmente a gameplay.
Jogo extremamente bom para jogar com os amigos!, só queee!  o jogo não ajuda muito os iniciantes o que prejudica muito os novos players e acaba fazendo com que eles abandonem logo no começo

la verdad lo compre para pasar el rato y me termino encantando... una vez que le agarras la mano al juego se vuelve mucho mejor... para el que se lo quiera comprar y no sabe de que va le recomiendo que vea algun gameplay para ver si le gusta...

*Buy when its on sale, even the DLC. Don't buy all at once. Try the game and 1 DLC and see how you feel.*

For the sake of this, I want to preface with: The community of the game is usually quite toxic, from either side (Survivors and Killers alike). Tea-bagging, after game communications, hatred for what you run/what you use, who you play as, which map you choose. All aspects are going to gain hatred from someone.

The game is fun- especially when you get to understand the mechanics behind both sides, along with certain 'rules' you set for yourself when playing killer, surviving alone, or surviving with friends. Perk combos allow for some interesting play styles, although not all are optimal. Some perks are not even worth getting or playing with sadly, but you can learn those yourself either through guides or just playing.

the game is annoying when you deal with certain combos are made, to where the game is almost to surive against or if the whole surviving team is working together with talking as well. But those can be off-set by grinding people. Kinda people who just want to grind for those sweet BP. Eh.

It's a game you have to see and check out. Not recomended for people who scare easily or who get into conversations with other gamers with easily.

This game has been out for years and its still loaded with bugs. The only reason someone might play is to have fun with friends. If you're playing alone then uninstall lol, this game is garbo and infuriating. The game developer's don't care about survivors at all and spend all their time working on killers. Why do half the survivors look like they're balding even with cosmetics. Don't get me started on the flashlight which works never unless you time everything and aim directly at their cornea. 3/10 dont recommend

Update: I ended up buying the pass because I play the game quite frequently. Tell me why the rewards for the pass are cosmetics for survivors that I do not own. In order for me to benefit from the pass, I would have to spend even more money on this garbage game for the dlc on characters that aren't even licensed. And no I'm not going to spend 25 hours on the game just to get enough iridescent shards to afford a new survivor. I also started playing killer recently. Tell me why Im going against rank 4 survivors as a rank 17 killer. Fix your matchmaking then work on your ugly ass cosmetics that cost 10 dollars.

Survivor is good if you got friends, randos just kinda leave/rq.

Para fãs da cultura cinematográfica das décadas de 1970 e 1980, especificamente da vertente trash, slasher e gore, um prato mais do que cheio. A temática é atraente, simula bem a situação de sobrevivência e também dá a oportunidade de jogar com o assassino, o que é um grande diferencial. Poder controlar, por exemplo, o mítico Michael Myers, criação das mentes cinematográficas privilegiadas de John Carpenter e Debra Hill, ou Freddy Kruger, do igualmente brilhante Wes Craven, é uma experiência absurda, até pela forma como o game implementa a mecânica, simulando de forma bastante satisfatória como seria controlar tais personagens agindo da mesma forma como eles agem em seus filmes.

O game pode passar uma impressão inicial de ser desbalanceado, o que foi o meu caso, mas é importante tentar absorver com mais calma o conteúdo, fazer os tutoriais e assistir a alguns vídeos explicativos sobre as builds possíveis e assim aproveitar melhor do que ele tem para oferecer; o que eu diria que é bastante coisa.
Un juego con el que aprendes a cagarte del susto en 39 idiomas diferentes, pero muy bien elaborado lo recomiendo 10/10 estrellas michelín.
good game alone or with friends. very funny to troll the killer with friends

Alright bitches let me tell you about this game, and before I start I'll just say that I have reached rank 1 on killer on 3 consecutive rank resets , so this review might be a little killer sided. 
I think dead by daylight is a good , unique , and fun game. Now when I say fun game I don't mean that the game will be fun for every second you play it , that's just impossible. This game can be lame as hell , but when it is fun , it is VERY fun. Now I think dead by daylight is a good game meaning that it has the traits of making the player enjoy it , that including being fun , not terribly hard to learn , and being at least somewhat balanced. And at last the game is unique from most other games and genres, now this is where comes one of it's biggest problems : it's so unique that it is difficult to balance. For example , counter strike global offensive has been out for ages , and lots of shooters like Valorant have learned from mistakes of games like CSGO and that knowledge could be used for balancing out newer patches of games. While with DBD you can't really learn off of other games's mistakes so it's difficult going from a clean sheet of paper. 
Before I say anything , I don't think the killers , perks, and items im going to be talking about are unplayable against, I just think they make the game be frustrating to play which makes it unfun. I think there are builds , items , and killers you can absolutely abuse to reach the highest rank, and I myself have abused the killer Wraith to reach the peak. And as loads of people start to abuse these things , the community becomes much angrier and in the end more toxic, which is I would say another problem in dbd . People are extremely toxic because you brang certain perks . items , or addons. As though I think this is more of a community problem than game problem , I think it still is good to know for all the people that wanna get into this game. 
But despite the negativity I think dead by daylight is a great game as it gets updated very often , has a creative dev team , and is one of a kind. I just wanted to say , Thank you BHVR and happy 5 years of this great game , keep it going!

Out of all the reviews I wrote, This one is probably the most serious one I wrote.

For starters the community of this game sucks just like every online game, You don't wanna talk to them because they're all just jerks who wanna say you suck or you camped or blah blah blah, its rare to get a nice compliment out of people in this game.

But you don't have to talk to the community either. Unlike most online games this one doesn't have a mic system so you don't have to worry about hearing a twelve year old cry baby raging at you for nothing. Only time you can talk to people in the game is in the beginning before the match starts if your a survivor and at the end after the match is over as both killer and survivor, The end chat is the only one the killer can talk to everyone in the match though. Mostly just to say GG for Good Game.

As Survivor you can basically just play every man for himself and be sneaky and say screw you to the other players or you can try to be a good team mate and rescue them if they get on a hook but if someone is a jerk in the chat before the match then you know who not to save if they get hooked.

I mostly play killer because I find it more fun than playing survivor and someones gotta play killer and from what I hear most people enjoy playing survivor more. Probably becuase as survivor it feels like a horror game and you get team mates while as killer you're by yourself.

But what i'm really trying to say is this game is really great even though the community sucks, Just ignore the community and if you get someone who is raging at the end just say gg to them and leave. After seeing that they didn't make you argue with them and waste your time it might make them even more mad even if you got the last word aka GG. So I give this game a 8/10.

I wonder if anyone actually read this review, I actually had to take my time to write this because I didn't wanna swear in it so you didn't see nothing but censor hearts that steam likes to do. So if you actually read this let me know by leaving a comment so I can be like someone read this peice of crap review yay!

I don't usually review things without it just being a joke, however, I am in love with this game. As a survivor, you have a lot of options, not only with customization but also with how you want to play the game. Same with the killers. Whether you want to be a stalker to build up your powers and strike when the time's right, or just straight assault the survivors with brutality, you have so many options on how to do each playstyle. The only thing I'd change as a dev would be to increase the amount of currency you get towards unlocking new characters. other than that, DbD is a brilliant game that I will keep coming back to no matter what
